alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Irwin; Turner (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 2:18PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Irwin, southeastern Turner and Ben Hill Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 218 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ashburn, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Ashburn, Sycamore, Rebecca, Lulaville, Inaha, Irwinville, Fitzgerald Municipal A/P, Turner Co Airport, Irwinville Airport, Bowens Mill, Red Bluff, Arp, Abba and Queensland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for south central Georgia.
